dict.acceptation: 漂亮的；娇小可爱的；机灵的，精明的；矫揉造作的；

sent.orig: People around me always praised me and said that I was a cute, lovely girl.
sent.trans: 身边的人们总是夸奖我说我很cute,可爱。

sent.orig: Did the cute cookie cutters cut cute cookies?
sent.trans: 可爱的饼干切工切割可爱的饼干？

sent.orig: Ted tried to break the ice with the cute girl at the bar by a joke.
sent.trans: 在酒吧时，泰德试图藉由说笑话与可爱的女孩搭讪。

sent.orig: Olive: What sweet little kittens! Aren't they cute?
sent.trans: 奥莉夫：多麽可爱的小猫！它们样子不是很伶俐吗？

sent.orig: This smart, brave, just a small machine is almost cute doll.
sent.trans: 这个聪明、勇敢、正义的小机器娃娃几乎是人见人爱。
